item.description: Death Investigation; INC#1478; 07:40PM; 20873 W Martha St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3SmP4vJ; #WoodlandHills; One adult female found deceased and remains on scene within a 1,404 square foot one-story home where there was evidence of a fire (out upon LAFD arrival). No other injuries. Fire cause and death under active investigation. No further details. Media Inquiries: LAFD, LAPD Topanga Division (Incident #3982) and Coroner.; FS 84; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E293 E84 RA84 T93; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Industrial Fatality; INC#0522; 09:44AM; 1414 W 81st St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3zrnViL; #ManchesterSquare; One adult male worker (unknown site affiliation) remains at scene trapped beneath and fatally injured by a skid-steer loader that reportedly fell upon him as he was attempting to unload it from a vehicle. No other injuries reported. Media Inquiries: LAPD 77th Street Division (Incident #1598), Cal-OSHA and Coroner.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E233 E266 E33 E57 EM13 HR3 RA33 RA57 T33 T66; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1796; 12:05AM; 9126 N Van Nuys Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3zrQPit; Panorama City; KNOCKDOWN: The first 30 firefighters, prior to the arrival of the additionally requested resources, extinguished the fire in 32 minutes. The fire extended slightly into a grocery market within the strip mall but was prevented from extending into the office building (smoke is being cleared from the structure). There are no injuries reported. Cause and $ loss TBD. ; FS 7; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 BC12 BC14 BC15 CM40 CM42 E103 E239 E275 E287 E289 E290 E298 E39 E7 E81 E89 E90 EM15 HR3 RA7 RA89 RA90 T39 T75 T87 T89 T90 T98 UR88 UR89; CH9; 17 18; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1796; 11:33PM; 9126 N Van Nuys Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3zrQPit; Panorama City; One story strip mall with an outside fire impinging on a two story office building and the strip mall. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 7; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 BC12 BC14 BC15 CM40 CM42 E103 E239 E275 E287 E289 E290 E298 E39 E7 E81 E89 E90 EM15 HR3 RA7 RA89 RA90 T39 T75 T87 T89 T90 T98 UR88 UR89; CH9; 17 18; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire - NOW OUT; INC#1517; 08:21PM; 19309 W Ventura Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3zn4mIh; Tarzana; FIRE NOW OUT: Original 9-1-1 call received at 8:08PM. The two story strip mall had nothing showing up on the arrival of the first fire companies. During their investigation, they located fire in one unit. An aggressive fire attack extinguished the fire in 13 minutes and prevented it from extending into the adjoining businesses. There are no injuries reported. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 93; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC15 BC17 E273 E293 E72 E83 E93 T73 T93; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1397; 07:37PM; 1711 E 15th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Q6QuZe; Downtown; KNOCKDOWN: 48 firefighters extinguished the fire in 45 minutes with no injuries reported. Once the bulk of the blaze was out, firefighters transitioned to the offensive mode to reach the remaining pockets of fire on the 2nd floor. The fire was prevented from extending beyond the building of origin. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 CM20 CM22 E1 E10 E17 E2 E209 E210 E215 E221 E4 E9 EA1 RA17 T10 T15 T21 T9; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#1397; 07:20PM; 1711 E 15th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Q6QuZe; Downtown; Firefighters remain in the defensive mode with the 2nd floor of the building well involved. Crews are also defending a neighboring pallet yard and building from damage. One additional task force requested (reflected in this alert). No injuries reported. ; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E10 E17 E2 E209 E210 E4 T10 T9 E9 LF15 E10 CM22; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1397; 06:52PM; 1711 E 15th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Q6QuZe; Downtown; One story, vacant commercial building with the first floor well involved in fire. There is at least one additional building and a pallet yard exposed. Firefighters are in the defensive mode. ; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E17 E2 E209 E210 E4 T10 T9; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1124; 04:24PM; 2741 W Beverly Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Qa6ytf; Westlake; KNOCKDOWN: 30 firefighters extinguished the fire in 17 minutes with no injuries reported. The building is vacant and the primary/secondary searches did not locate anyone in the building. The fire was prevented from extending into the attic. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 BC18 BC5 E211 E220 E35 E52 E6 RA10 RA56 T11 T20; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1124; 04:07PM; 2741 W Beverly Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Qa6ytf; Westlake; One story, commercial building with moderate smoke showing. The building is estimated to be 50' x 75' and appears to be vacant. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. ; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC18 BC5 E211 E220 E35 E52 E6 T11 T20; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart
